page.title: 07Day in the life of Catherine
page.content: I am woken up by the bird's pleasant singing. After breakfast I decide to go for a walk and have a picnic with a friend .At 9.30 I walk to my friend's house to ask if she wants to come. When I get home I go into the shed and get 2 nets to go butterfly catching. My friend asks if I would not mind her sister coming. She also brought me a bowl of strawberries from her garden. I packed up my lunch for the picnic. I took sandwiches, home made lemonade (ice cold) and some chocolate crispy cakes "mmmmm", also I took some fruit, apples, bananas, pears, and peaches. I got the butter- fly nets and set off. We got to a field where the grass is waist high. We ran through the field tripping over here and there. It was fun. When we got to the bottom of the field, we ... cont. next page...
